channel.title: Going from End to W1
channel.description: When you go into the end and go back to World 1 you spawn far away from spawn. It's getting frustrating cause then I have to use spawn to get back to where I want to be.

item.title: Going from End to W1
item.dc:creator: @xylo xylo
item.description:
@xylo wrote:

Instead of wiping out the end, for now, why not add another portal at a spot near where you spawn when coming from the end. You could link this portal to a temporary portal in the portal room. this could be a solution until you figure out a way to fix the portals.

Read full topic

item.title: Going from End to W1
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:9, topic:440329”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=543004.msg3980329#msg3980329 date=1335156937]
I don’t know, I’ve never used MCEdit.
[/quote]
You can actually spawn end portals. I tried it yesterday with too many items.[/quote]

That’s how the current portal TO the end works, but the one FROM the end (that is malfunctioning) was naturally created.

Read full topic

item.title: Going from End to W1
item.dc:creator: @Spankr_Poodle Spankr Poodle
item.description:
@Spankr_Poodle wrote:

Gah, are you sure there isn’t a way to edit the portal with MCEdit?

If not, then I want to move all the materials I’ve got in the end back to the castle (it’s a lot since I thought this wouldn’t happen)

EDIT: Replaced “base” with “castle”.

Read full topic

item.title: Going from End to W1
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Spankr Poodle, post:5, topic:440329”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=543004.msg3979944#msg3979944 date=1335127034]
The only way I know how to fix this is by wiping The End like I want to do, but someone said they had a base there.
[/quote]

Can’t you just create another portal like you did with the portals we have in the portal room, and just link them together?[/quote]

I can’t edit or modify the way ‘end’ portals connect, the current end portals are actual ‘end’ portals.

[quote=“deathwilldie0, post:4, topic:440329”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=543004.msg3979944#msg3979944 date=1335127034]
The only way I know how to fix this is by wiping The End like I want to do, but someone said they had a base there.
[/quote]

Yeah we’ve got a nice base there but if that’s the only way we can just try to rebuild it, but we would need to get all of our resources out of it first.[/quote]

Actually I was planning on resetting the end regularly if no one had been in it for X number of hours or something, that way the dragon would re-spawn and be a continuing challenge for the players.

Read full topic
